extracted_playbook.title: Manage Privileged Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Manage the creation, modification, use, and permissions associated with privileged accounts, including SYSTEM and root.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Secure Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Set and enforce secure password policies for accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Unnecessary Software
extracted_playbook.description: Remove or deny access to unnecessary and potentially vulnerable software to prevent abuse by adversaries.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform System Audits
extracted_playbook.description: Perform audits or scans of systems, permissions, insecure software, insecure configurations, etc., to identify potential weaknesses.

extracted_playbook.title: Make Configuration Changes for System Hardening
extracted_playbook.description: Make configuration changes related to the operating system or a common feature of the operating system that result in system hardening against techniques.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce MFA by requiring users to provide two or more pieces of information to authenticate to a system.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Use network appliances to filter ingress or egress traffic and perform protocol-based filtering. Configure software on endpoints to filter network traffic.

extracted_playbook.title: Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Architect sections of the network to isolate critical systems, functions, or resources. Use physical and logical segmentation to prevent access to potentially sensitive systems and information.

extracted_playbook.title: Use DMZ for Internet-facing Services
extracted_playbook.description: Use a demilitarized zone (DMZ) to contain any internet-facing services that should not be exposed from the internal network.

extracted_playbook.title: Prevent Access to Unnecessary Services
extracted_playbook.description: Prevent access to file shares, remote access to systems, and unnecessary services using network concentrators, RDP gateways, etc.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Code Execution
extracted_playbook.description: Block execution of code on a system through application control, and/or script blocking.

extracted_playbook.title: Update All Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update all software to the latest versions to ensure security patches are applied.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement robust network segmentation between IT and ICS networks to limit lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Design ICS Network Topology
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a network topology for ICS with multiple layers, with the most critical communications in the most secure layer.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Further Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Apply further segmentation to portions of the network that are reliant on one another by functionality.

extracted_playbook.title: Use One-way Communication Diodes
extracted_playbook.description: Use one-way communication diodes to prevent external access, whenever possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Up DMZs
extracted_playbook.description: Set up DMZs to create a physical and logical subnetwork that acts as an intermediary for connected security devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Employ Reliable Network Security Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Employ reliable network security protocols and services where feasible.

extracted_playbook.title: Use VLANs for Additional Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Consider using VLANs for additional network segmentation, such as placing all printers in separate VLANs.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Perimeter Security
extracted_playbook.description: Implement perimeter security between network segments to limit lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Control Traffic Between Network Segments
extracted_playbook.description: Control traffic between network segments using firewalls, IDSs, and filtering rules on routers and switches.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network monitoring at key chokepoints and at key assets or services.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IDS for ICS Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Configure an IDS to create alarms for any ICS traffic outside normal operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Security Incident and Event Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Configure security incident and event monitoring to analyze and correlate event logs from across the ICS network.

extracted_playbook.title: Test Patches in Out-of-band Environments
extracted_playbook.description: Test all patches in out-of-band testing environments before implementation into production environments.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Application Allow Listing
extracted_playbook.description: Implement application allow listing on human machine interfaces and engineering workstations.

extracted_playbook.title: Harden Software Configuration on Field Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Harden software configuration on field devices, including tablets and smartphones.

extracted_playbook.title: Replace End-of-life Software and Hardware
extracted_playbook.description: Replace all end-of-life software and hardware devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports and Services
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports and services on ICS devices after testing to ensure this will not affect ICS operation.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict and Manage Remote Access Software
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict and manage remote access software.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce MFA for Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce MFA for remote access to ICS networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Encryption for Network Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Configure encryption and security for network protocols within the ICS environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Disallow Vendor Device Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Do not allow vendors to connect their devices to the ICS network.

extracted_playbook.title: Disallow Transient Device Communication
extracted_playbook.description: Disallow any devices that do not live solely on the ICS environment from communicating on the platform.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain ICS Asset Inventory
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain an ICS asset inventory of all hardware, software, and supporting infrastructure technologies.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Robust Host Logging
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain robust host logging on critical devices within the ICS environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Robust Physical Security
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure robust physical security is in place to prevent unauthorized access to controlled spaces housing ICS equipment.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Test Manual Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly test manual controls to ensure critical functions can continue if ICS/OT networks are taken offline.
